arts.ttl: Hurzeler calls for Brighton to be 'humble' after Man Utd win
arts.sum: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler praises side after they beat Manchester United 3-1 at Old Trafford, condemning them to a fourth defeat in five Premier League home games.

arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes issues rallying cry to his dejected Man United team-mates - as Brighton defeat marks their worst start for 131 years
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT OLD TRAFFORD: Despite the Manchester United captain cancelling out Yankuba Minteh's opener from the penalty spot, Ruben Amorim's side folded and were soundly beaten 3-1

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim shows true colours with reaction to Man Utd fans after Brighton loss
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim oversaw yet another defeat on Sunday, with Brighton leaving the Red Devils firmly in the Premier League's bottom half after winning 3-1

arts.ttl: 'We have one of his favourite players' - Fabian Hurzeler on 'special' meeting with Sir Alex Ferguson
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler said it was 'very special' to meet Sir Alex Ferguson before Brighton's match against Manchester United at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Man United's season hits a new low as club match unwanted record for the first time in 131 years with defeat to Brighton at Old Trafford
arts.sum: It was a sixth home defeat of the season for Ruben Amorim 's men, who had already lost to Liverpool , Tottenham , Nottingham Forest , Bournemouth and Newcastle on their.

arts.ttl: Why Carlos Baleba Wasn’t Sent Off For Foul on Joshua Zirkzee in Man Utd 1-3 Brighton
arts.sum: Man United were soundly beaten 3-1 at Old Trafford by Brighton - but some fans have been left baffled at the decision not to show Baleba a red card.

arts.ttl: Manchester United 1-3 Brighton & Hove Albion: How much worse can Ruben Amorim's side get in the Premier League?
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim admits that his side are likely the worst United side in the history of the club following their loss against Brighton & Hove Albion.

arts.ttl: Fabian Hurzeler reveals why latest win over Manchester United was no surprise to him
arts.sum: Fabian Hurzeler was not surprised to see his Brighton team comfortably beat Manchester United at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Brighton win at Man Utd AGAIN to extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion became the second team to record three consecutive Premier League away wins at Old Trafford after beating Manchester United 3-1 on Sunday. However, Brighton would establish an advantage on the hour through Mitoma, who became the highest-scoring Japanese player in Premier League history with his 15th goal in the competition, before Onana spilled Yasin Ayari’s ball into the box, allowing Rutter the opportunity to pounce late on.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim says he is managing 'maybe the worst Manchester United team in history' after Brighton loss
arts.sum: Angry Red Devils boss says his side are ‘breaking all the bad records’ and that everybody is underperforming after latest home defeat
